enable_sign_data_warning.message: If you enable this setting, you might get signature requests that aren't readable. By signing a message you don't understand, you could be agreeing to give away your funds and NFTs.You're at risk for phishing attacks. Protect yourself by turning off signData.

enable_sign_data_popover_warning.message: Allowing signData requests can make you vulnerable to phishing attacks. Always review the URL and be careful when signing messages that contain code.

Credit card payment services are provided by our partners. universal Wallet acts solely as an intermediary platform and assumes no liability for any potential losses or damages that may arise from using the credit card payment service.

legacy_address_warning_3.message: It is not recommended to use legacy addresses, as they may lead to higher transaction fees or the unintended lock-up of CAT20 balances.

legacy_address_warning_4.message: It is not recommended to send transactions to legacy addresses, as this may result in the unintended spending of CAT20 balances.

unavailable_tooltip.message: If your balance shows as unavailable, it may be because your UTXOs are locked due to containing inscriptions, runes, brc-20 assets, or being unconfirmed. In most cases, you can use our UTXO Management Tool to unlock these UTXOs and make them spendable again.

sign_all_transactions_at_once.message: You have the option to sign all transactions at once, but please note that universal Wallet will not verify each transaction individually. We strongly recommend using it only on trusted and familiar websites to minimize the risk of potential losses.

important_to_not_transfer_this_token.message: Important: Please do not transfer this token due to a temporary indexing discrepancy. We are awaiting resolution from the protocol's founding team. Other tokens unaffected.

msg_scan_qr_code.message: Please scan the QR code with your cold wallet

scan_this_qr_code_with_your_cold_wallet_.message: Scan this QR code with your cold wallet to review and sign the transaction.

open_your_cold_wallet_app_or_device.message: 1. Open your cold wallet app or device.

review_and_confirm_transaction_details_i.message: 3. Review and confirm transaction details in your cold wallet.

after_signing_scan_the_signed_qr_code_ba.message: 4. After signing, scan the signed QR code back with this wallet.

cold_wallet_signed_successfully.message: Cold wallet has successfully signed the transaction. Please confirm the transaction details and click broadcast.

sighash_none_risk_description.message: SIGHASH_NONE is a special signature type that allows the transaction to be modified after signing. This can lead to potential loss of funds if the transaction is altered maliciously. Please ensure you trust the source of this transaction before proceeding.

scammer_address_risk_description.message: This address has been reported as a scammer address. Proceed with caution. If you believe this is a false positive, please report it to us.

network_not_matched_risk_description.message: This transaction is not on current Network, please ensure you trust the source of this transaction before proceeding.

inscription_burning_risk_description.message: This transaction involves the burning of inscriptions. Please ensure you understand the implications of this action before proceeding.

multiple_assets_risk_description.message: This transaction involves multiple assets. Please ensure you understand the implications of this action before proceeding.

high_fee_rate_risk_description.message: This transaction has a high fee rate. Please ensure you understand the implications of this action before proceeding.

merging_inscriptions_risk_description.message: This transaction involves merging inscriptions. Please ensure you understand the implications of this action before proceeding.

changing_inscription_risk_description.message: This transaction involves changing an inscription. Please ensure you understand the implications of this action before proceeding.

runes_burning_risk_description.message: This transaction involves the burning of Runes. Please ensure you understand the implications of this action before proceeding.

runes_multiple_assets_risk_description.message: This transaction involves multiple Runes assets. Please ensure you understand the implications of this action before proceeding.

indexer_api_down_risk_description.message: The indexer API is currently down. This may affect the accuracy of transaction details and asset balances. Please proceed with caution and verify all information independently.

runes_api_down_risk_description.message: The Runes API is currently down. This may affect the accuracy of transaction details and Runes asset balances. Please proceed with caution and verify all information independently.

alkanes_burning_risk_description.message: This transaction involves the burning of Alkanes. Please ensure you understand the implications of this action before proceeding.

alkanes_multiple_assets_risk_description.message: This transaction involves multiple Alkanes assets. Please ensure you understand the implications of this action before proceeding.

utxo_indexing_risk_description.message: The selected UTXO belongs to a transaction that is still being indexed. To ensure transaction security and reliability, please wait for indexing to complete before proceeding.

assets_will_appear_here.message: Your assets will appear here once you receive them

password_security_tip.message: Use a strong password with at least 8 characters, including numbers and special characters.

cold_wallet_address_type_cannot_be_chang.message: Cold wallet address type cannot be changed
